patterns: Tell me about Dr. Ananda V R A
Faculty information for Dr. Ananda V R A
Details about Professor Dr. Ananda V R
responses: Dr. Ananda V R, serving as Professor & Head in the Civil Engineering department, has been a dynamic force since joining the institution on 1st August 2020. With a robust academic background, including a Bachelor's in Engineering with an outstanding 79.50%, a Master's in Technology with a remarkable 80%, and a completed PhD, Dr. Ananda brings a wealth of knowledge and leadership to the department. With a cumulative experience of 15 years in teaching and 2 years in industry, Dr. Ananda is dedicated to fostering academic excellence and contributing to the growth of students and the institution.

patterns: Tell me about Mr.Prashantha
Faculty information for Prashantha
Details about Professor Mr. Prashantha
responses: Prashantha has been a dedicated member of the teaching staff, holding the position of Assistant Professor in the Civil Engineering department since joining the institution on 5th November 2005. With a strong academic foundation, including a Bachelor's in Engineering with an impressive 78% and a Master's in Technology with a notable 8.3 CGPA, Prashantha brings valuable experience and expertise to the academic community. With years of service, Prashantha continues to contribute to the growth and development of students in the field of Civil Engineering.

patterns: Tell me about Dr. Surekha
Faculty information for  Surekha
Details about Professor Dr Surekha
responses: Surekha T has been a valuable member of the institution, serving as an Assistant Professor in the Civil Engineering department since joining on 1st July 2015. With a solid academic background, including a Bachelor's in Engineering with a commendable 76.97% and a Master's in Technology with an impressive 85.57%, Surekha brings dedication and expertise to the academic community. Her commitment to excellence in teaching and research contributes to the overall academic growth and success of the department and its students.

patterns: Tell me about Shishirakrishna S

Details about Professor Shishirakrishna
responses: Shishirakrishna S is a dedicated member of the teaching staff, holding the position of Assistant Professor in the Civil Engineering department since joining the institution on 5th August 2022. With a solid academic foundation, including a Bachelor's in Engineering with a notable 73.8% and a Master's in Technology with an impressive 85.88%, Shishirakrishna contributes expertise and enthusiasm to the academic community. His recent addition to the faculty brings a fresh perspective to the field of Civil Engineering.

patterns: Tell me about Shrikanth Rao
Faculty information for Shrikanth Rao
Details about Professor Dr. Shrikanth Rao S.K
responses: Dr. Shrikanth Rao S.K has been an integral part of the institution, serving as an Assistant Professor in the Electronics and Communication department since joining on 7th August 2006. With a strong academic background, including a First Class in Bachelor of Engineering and a Master's in Technology with Distinction, Shrikanth contributes both experience and ongoing research pursuits to the academic community. Currently pursuing a PhD, his dedication to continuous learning enhances the academic environment in Electronics and Communication.

patterns: Tell me about Computer Science & Engineering (Data Science)g
Details about Computer Science & Engineering (Data Science)g
Tell me about CSE((DS)/CD
responses: Computer Science & Engineering (Data Science) is an allied branch of Computer Science, a Four year Under Graduate programme, which focuses on technology for creating intelligent machines which can think and work like human beings. The field of artificial intelligence has been an interdisciplinary endeavor, and is a technology which enables a machine to simulate human behavior. Machine learning is an application of artificial intelligence that provides systems the ability to automatically learn and improve from experience without being explicitly programmed. ML focuses on the development of computer programs that can access data and use it learn for themselves. Artificial intelligence has made its way through all sectors of society. Every person is using this technology in some or the other way. Moreover, it is modified for different age groups and industrial sectors. The program begins with introductory courses in programming, computer science, mathematics, and statistics that provide a firm technical foundation. From there, students learn core AI concepts and techniques of CSE((DS)/CD, Virtual Reality, Web Applications, Natural Language and Image Processing, Robotic Process Automation, Business Analytics, Speech Processing, Cognitive Systems, Biometrics Systems, Computer Vision, and Language Understanding. The program includes a variety of advanced AI electives, enabling technical mastery in specific subfields. Also, specific electives are introduced that will focus on the Application of AI in various industry.

patterns: Tell me the vision of CSE Department
Tell me the vision of Computer Science and Engineering Department
responses: To exceed expectations as one of the alluded specialized Department, making progress through a dynamic learning environment; creating socially capable nationals.

patterns: Tell me about the Mission of CSE Department
Tell me about the mission of Computer Science and Engineering
responses: M1: To create trained inventive and quality specialists in Computer Science. M2: To encourage staff to update skills and aptitudes by teaching proficient values in the alterably evolving environment. M3: To develop best in-class infrastructural facilities, making progress. M4: To produce commonly valuable associations with Government, Industry, Society, Alumni and advance Entrepreneurship.

intents.tag: Computer Science and Engineering  (Data Science) The Program Educational Objectives (PEOs)
patterns: The Program Educational Objectives (PEOs) of CSE
The Program Educational Objectives (PEOs) of Computer Science and Engineerin
PEO of CSE
PEO of Computer Science and Engineering
responses: Work productively as Computer Engineers, including supportive and leadership roles in multidisciplinary domain.Participate in life-long learning through the successful completion of advanced degrees, continuing education, certifications and/or other professional developments.Promote design, research, product implementation and services in the field of Computer Science and Engineering through strong technical, communication and entrepreneurial skills.

intents.tag: Computer Science & Engineering (Data Science)g The Program Educational Objectives (PEOs)
patterns: The Program Educational Objectives (PEOs) of CSE((DS)/CD
The Program Educational Objectives (PEOs) of Computer Science & Engineering (Data Science)g
PEO of CSE((DS)/CD
PEO of Computer Science & Engineering (Data Science)g
responses: Work productively as Computer Engineers, including supportive and leadership roles in multidisciplinary domain. Participate in life-long learning through the successful completion of advanced degrees, continuing education, certifications and/or other professional developments. Promote design, research, product implementation and services in the field of Computer Science and Engineering through strong technical, communication and entrepreneurial skills.

patterns: What are the CSE((DS)/CD  Dept Highlights
What are the Computer Science & Engineering (Data Science)g Dept Highlights
What are the Computer Science & Engineering (Data Science)g Department Highlights
What are the CSE((DS)/CD  Department Highlights
responses: The Department of Artificial Intelligence& Machine learning is providing high quality education, along with training the students with all the new advancements. The learned and skilled Faculties of Department give prominence on all the important aspects of Computers, such as Data Structures, Design and Analysis of Algorithms, Python, Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence, Deep Learning, Operating Systems, Data Science, Cloud Computing, and many more. The Department also takes initiative to improve the Soft Skills, Analytical Capabilities and Verbal Communication of the students by various club activities and trainings. The focus of the programs is on experiential learning implemented through course projects, mini projects and a major project along with seminars and assignments. The Department encourages and motivates the students to attend conferences and workshops and publish papers in national / international conferences / journals.

patterns: Laboratory Facilities
What are the Laboratory Facilities
Laboratory Facilities of CSE((DS)/CD  Dept
Laboratory Facilities of Computer Science Department
responses: Python Lab, AI Lab, Machine Learning Lab, Computer Programming Lab, Data Structures Lab, Design and Analysis of Algorithms Lab, Analog and Digital Electronics Lab, Microprocessor Lab, Data base Management System Lab, Mobile Application Development Lab

patterns: What overarching goals and values does VCET aim to achieve, as outlined in its vision statement?
What are the vision of the VCET?
Can you provide insights into VCET's long, term aspirations   vision  ?
How does VCET articulate its desired future state   vision  ?
responses: Vision , To excel as one of the preferred technical institutes, achieving success through a dynamic learning environment thus leading to socially responsible citizens.

patterns: What overarching goals and values does VCET aim to achieve, as outlined in its mission statements?
What are the mission of the VCET?
Can you provide insights into VCET's fundamental purpose or reason for existence   mission  ?
How does takes to fulfill its purpose   mission  ?
responses: Mission , Students: Mould students into engineers, capable of handling challenges both at professional and personal level thereby preparing them for life long learning. 1.Faculty: Facilitate faculty to upgrade competencies and skills by inculcating professional values in the dynamically changing environment. 2.Infrastructure: Build state, of, the, art infrastructural facilities contributing to students achieving success. 3.Stake holders: Forge mutually beneficial relationships with government, industry, society, alumni and promote entrepreneurship. 4.Teaching, learning: Cultivate innovative 'Teaching, Learning' environment with a student centric approach. 5.Governance: Incorporate participative decision making with focus on transparent governance system.
